title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, June 28, 2021
description: In the early hours of this day in 1969 the Stonewall riots broke out in New York City, marking the beginning of the gay rights movement.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: In the early hours of this day in 1969 the Stonewall riots broke out in New York City, marking the beginning of the gay rights movement.
